original_text: And they have no root in themselves, but endure for a while; then, when tribulation or persecution arises on account of the word, immediately they fall away.
korean_text: 그 속에 뿌리가 없어 잠깐 견디다가 말씀으로 인하여 환난이나 박해가 일어나는 때에는 곧 넘어지는 자요

sentences.original_text: And they have no root in themselves,
then, when tribulation or persecution arises on account of the word,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 환난이나 박해가 말씀 때문에 일어나면,
